MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick-Upon- Tweed. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at Midnight to carry out safe repairs to an underground cable fault on Palace Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:54am on 27th December
